    Editable - Interface in main.java.text_editor.interfaces
    The Editable interface defines the basic text editing capabilities.
    Editor - Class in main.java.text_editor.editors
    The abstract Editor class serves as the base class for all editor implementations.
    Editor() - Constructor for class main.java.text_editor.editors.Editor
    Default constructor that initializes an empty editor with caret at position 0.
    Editor(String) - Constructor for class main.java.text_editor.editors.Editor
    Constructor that initializes the editor with the specified text and places the caret at the end of the text.
